name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Amazon D-Score â€“ Reliable Product Ratings

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows additional rating for every Amazon product listing by subtracting the % of 1-star ratings from the % of 5-star ratings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Note: This extension is 100% free to use! If you love it, tell your friends about it and please consider making a donation: https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=ZDMRWXAD6TCRL.

---

Two products with the exact same Amazon star ratings can actually vary widely in quality. The D-Score brings a more reliable product rating to every product on Amazon search results page so you can quickly make an informed decision between many different products.

The D-Score is calculated by taking the percentage of 5-star ratings given to a product (the promoters) and subtracting the percentage of 1-star ratings given to the product (the detractors). This produces a score between -100 and 100 that proves to be a very accurate predictor of product quality.

D-Scores above 80 are considered excellent products that you can have confidence in purchasing. In order to make D-Scores even easier to understand, the score is converted into between 0 and 5 filled in purple dots so you can compare products at a glance.
